data.name: Sudokolorful
data.detailed_description:
Stay tuned!

Wishlist Sudokolorful and receive notifications from Steam when the game comes out!


About the Game

Sudokolorful is a color-based puzzle game, suitable for color blindness, which reinvents the classic Sudoku game.
Your main objective is to fill every empty spot with a color, being careful to not repeat colors in the same line, column and neighborhood (bigger squares).



  • Challenge your brain with different types of Sudoku: 4x4, 6x6 and 9x9
  • Choose between three difficulties: easy, medium and hard
  • Color blindness? Turn Colorblind Mode On. Color palette carefully thought for every type of color blindness but Achromatopsia
  • Save your current game anytime
  • Do you prefer the classic Sudoku? Turn the numbers on
  • Do you like to chill a little bit? Turn the timer off and enjoy your experience with a relaxing soundtrack
  • Do you like competition? Rank every game to your local Ranking

data.short_description: Sudokolorful is a color-based puzzle game (suitable for color blindness) which reinvents the classic Sudoku game. Instead of numbers, play with colors! Challenge your brain with different types of Sudoku: 4x4, 6x6 and 9x9, each one with easy, medium and hard difficulties.
data.supported_languages: English, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese, Traditional Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: 2 gigahertz (GHz) or faster processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible with DirectX 9 or later
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 380 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: 2 gigahertz (GHz) or faster processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible with DirectX 9 or later
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 380 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
